title: Bug 21706: Class.forName() Usage in BidiUtil on Win32
description: This bug report addresses the usage of Class.forName() in BidiUtil on the Win32 platform.
SR:
To implement this change, follow these steps:
1. Locate the line of code: 'static Callback callback = new Callback (BidiUtil.class, 'windowProc', 4);'
2. Replace it with: 'static Callback callback = new Callback (new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4);'
3. This adjustment should rectify the problem caused by the usage of 'Class.forName()' and the associated NoClassDefFoundError.
